mapper.select: SELECT cust_id, cust_name, cust_user_id, cust_create_id, b.dict_item_name cust_source, c.dict_item_name cust_industry, d.dict_item_name cust_level, cust_linkman, cust_phone, cust_mobile, cust_createtime FROM customer a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dict_id, dict_item_name FROM base_dict WHERE dict_type_code = '002' ) b ON a.cust_source = b.dict_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dict_id, dict_item_name FROM base_dict WHERE dict_type_code = '001' ) c ON a.cust_industry = c.dict_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dict_id, dict_item_name FROM base_dict WHERE dict_type_code = '006' ) d ON a.cust_level = d.dict_id
